remarks: A lattice element that commutes with two others also commutes with their join.  Theorem 4.2 of [Beran] p. 49.  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
fh1.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
fh1.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
fh1.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
fh1.4 $e |- A C_H B $.
fh1.5 $e |- A C_H C $.
cm2ji $p |- A C_H ( B vH C ) $.
